article.title: Kollmorgen to Provide Optics Technology
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Kollmorgen Corp., Northampton, Mass., is being awarded a $9,799,832 cost-plus-fixed-fee basic ordering agreement for engineering and logistics services, refurbishment, overhaul and upgrade in support of the MK 46 Optical Sight System and the MK 20 Electro-optical Sensor components and subcomponents. The Port Hueneme Division, Naval Surface Warfare Center, Port Hueneme, Calif., is the contracting activity (N00024-11-G-5449).
